programme.title: Discover the Firebird
programme.desc: The Discovery Orchestra helps both classical music novices and seasoned concertgoers to hear and appreciate new details in Igor Stravinsky's 1919 'Firebird Suite.'

programme.title: Great Performances
programme.desc: Go inside the mind of a genius as host Scott Yoo and fellow musicians undertake a recording of Beethoven's most personal music at a historic Berkshires manor to explore the composer's brilliant career where they are visited by some unexpected guests.

programme.title: One Voice: The Songs We Share
programme.desc: Revel in a range of country music performances hosted by Leslie Jordan, featuring Jake Blount, Claybourne Elder, Nic Gareiss, Travis Howard, Senora May with Luke Frazier and The American Pops Orchestra.

programme.desc: Enjoy American roots musical performances hosted by and starring Frank Waln with performances by Mauricio Martinez, Amber Merritt, Jacqueline Schwab, and Asako Tamura with Luke Frazier and The American Pops Orchestra.

programme.title: Amanpour and Company
programme.desc: In-depth conversations with global thought leaders and cultural influencers.

programme.title: The Open Mind
programme.desc: Explore the ideas of the most innovative journalists, historians and elected officials.

programme.title: Firing Line With Margaret Hoover
programme.desc: Sen. Bob Menendez, D-NJ, discusses his immigration reform plan and protecting Americans against floods. The Senate Foreign Relations Committee chair outlines how the U.S. should promote democracy in Cuba, support Taiwan and prevent a nuclear Iran.
